mapper.select: select top 1 ad.Id, ad.CarInTime, ad.CarOutTime, ad.ParkId, ad.guid, ad.CarType, bd.PlateNumber, bd.CarPayTime, bd.Id as BusinessDetailId, bd.Prepaid, bd.Receivable, bd.Money, bd.FactReceive, bd.BerthsecId from AbpParkadeAccessDetail ad left join AbpBusinessDetail bd on bd.guid=ad.guid where ad.PlateNumber=#{plateNumber} and ad.ParkId = #{parkId} and ad.CarOutTime is null and bd.Status = 1 order by CarInTime Desc
